subject: Math - Common Core
description: Determine an explicit expression, a recursive process, or steps for calculation from a context.
skill_short_name: Determine an explicit expression, a recursive process, or steps for calculation from a context.
name: Determine an explicit expression, a recursive process, or steps for calculation from a context.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Combine standard function types using arithmetic operations.
skill_short_name: Combine standard function types using arithmetic operations.
name: Combine standard function types using arithmetic operations.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: (+) Compose functions.
skill_short_name: (+) Compose functions.
name: (+) Compose functions.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Solve an equation of the form f(x) = c for a simple function f that has an inverse and write an expression for the inverse.
skill_short_name: Solve an equation of the form f(x) = c for a simple function f that has an inverse and write an expression for the inverse.
name: Solve an equation of the form f(x) = c for a simple function f that has an inverse and write an expression for the inverse.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: (+) Verify by composition that one function is the inverse of another.
skill_short_name: (+) Verify by composition that one function is the inverse of another.
name: (+) Verify by composition that one function is the inverse of another.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: (+) Read values of an inverse function from a graph or a table, given that the function has an inverse.
skill_short_name: (+) Read values of an inverse function from a graph or a table, given that the function has an inverse.
name: (+) Read values of an inverse function from a graph or a table, given that the function has an inverse.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: (+) Produce an invertible function from a non-invertible function by restricting the domain.
skill_short_name: (+) Produce an invertible function from a non-invertible function by restricting the domain.
name: (+) Produce an invertible function from a non-invertible function by restricting the domain.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Prove that linear functions grow by equal differences over equal intervals, and that exponential functions grow by equal factors over equal intervals.
skill_short_name: Prove that linear functions grow by equal differences over equal intervals, and that exponential functions grow by equal factors over equal intervals.
name: Prove that linear functions grow by equal differences over equal intervals, and that exponential functions grow by equal factors over equal intervals.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Recognize situations in which one quantity changes at a constant rate per unit interval relative to another.
skill_short_name: Recognize situations in which one quantity changes at a constant rate per unit interval relative to another.
name: Recognize situations in which one quantity changes at a constant rate per unit interval relative to another.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Recognize situations in which a quantity grows or decays by a constant percent rate per unit interval relative to another.
skill_short_name: Recognize situations in which a quantity grows or decays by a constant percent rate per unit interval relative to another.
name: Recognize situations in which a quantity grows or decays by a constant percent rate per unit interval relative to another.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Fit a function to the data; use functions fitted to data to solve problems in the context of the data.
skill_short_name: Fit a function to the data; use functions fitted to data to solve problems in the context of the data.
name: Fit a function to the data; use functions fitted to data to solve problems in the context of the data.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Informally assess the fit of a function by plotting and analyzing residuals.
skill_short_name: Informally assess the fit of a function by plotting and analyzing residuals.
name: Informally assess the fit of a function by plotting and analyzing residuals.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Fit a linear function for a scatter plot that suggests a linear association.
skill_short_name: Fit a linear function for a scatter plot that suggests a linear association.
name: Fit a linear function for a scatter plot that suggests a linear association.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Find the expected payoff for a game of chance.
skill_short_name: Find the expected payoff for a game of chance.
name: Find the expected payoff for a game of chance.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Graph linear and quadratic functions and show intercepts, maxima, and minima.
skill_short_name: Graph linear and quadratic functions and show intercepts, maxima, and minima.
name: Graph linear and quadratic functions and show intercepts, maxima, and minima.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Graph square root, cube root, and piecewise-defined functions, including step functions and absolute value functions.
skill_short_name: Graph square root, cube root, and piecewise-defined functions, including step functions and absolute value functions.
name: Graph square root, cube root, and piecewise-defined functions, including step functions and absolute value functions.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Graph polynomial functions, identifying zeros when suitable factorizations are available, and showing end behavior.
skill_short_name: Graph polynomial functions, identifying zeros when suitable factorizations are available, and showing end behavior.
name: Graph polynomial functions, identifying zeros when suitable factorizations are available, and showing end behavior.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: (+) Graph rational functions, identifying zeros and asymptotes when suitable factorizations are available, and showing end behavior.
skill_short_name: (+) Graph rational functions, identifying zeros and asymptotes when suitable factorizations are available, and showing end behavior.
name: (+) Graph rational functions, identifying zeros and asymptotes when suitable factorizations are available, and showing end behavior.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Graph exponential and logarithmic functions, showing intercepts and end behavior, and trigonometric functions, showing period, midline, and amplitude.
skill_short_name: Graph exponential and logarithmic functions, showing intercepts and end behavior, and trigonometric functions, showing period, midline, and amplitude.
name: Graph exponential and logarithmic functions, showing intercepts and end behavior, and trigonometric functions, showing period, midline, and amplitude.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Use the process of factoring and completing the square in a quadratic function to show zeros, extreme values, and symmetry of the graph, and interpret these in terms of a context.
skill_short_name: Use the process of factoring and completing the square in a quadratic function to show zeros, extreme values, and symmetry of the graph, and interpret these in terms of a context.
name: Use the process of factoring and completing the square in a quadratic function to show zeros, extreme values, and symmetry of the graph, and interpret these in terms of a context.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Use the properties of exponents to interpret expressions for exponential functions.
skill_short_name: Use the properties of exponents to interpret expressions for exponential functions.
name: Use the properties of exponents to interpret expressions for exponential functions.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Interpret parts of an expression, such as terms, factors, and coefficients.
skill_short_name: Interpret parts of an expression, such as terms, factors, and coefficients.
name: Interpret parts of an expression, such as terms, factors, and coefficients.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Interpret complicated expressions by viewing one or more of their parts as a single entity.
skill_short_name: Interpret complicated expressions by viewing one or more of their parts as a single entity.
name: Interpret complicated expressions by viewing one or more of their parts as a single entity.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Factor a quadratic expression to reveal the zeros of the function it defines.
skill_short_name: Factor a quadratic expression to reveal the zeros of the function it defines.
name: Factor a quadratic expression to reveal the zeros of the function it defines.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Complete the square in a quadratic expression to reveal the maximum or minimum value of the function it defines.
skill_short_name: Complete the square in a quadratic expression to reveal the maximum or minimum value of the function it defines.
name: Complete the square in a quadratic expression to reveal the maximum or minimum value of the function it defines.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Use the properties of exponents to transform expressions for exponential functions.
skill_short_name: Use the properties of exponents to transform expressions for exponential functions.
name: Use the properties of exponents to transform expressions for exponential functions.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Use the method of completing the square to transform any quadratic equation in x into an equation of the form (x - p)² = q that has the same solutions. Derive the quadratic formula from this form.
skill_short_name: Use the method of completing the square to transform any quadratic equation in x into an equation of the form (x - p)² = q that has the same solutions. Derive the quadratic formula from this form.
name: Use the method of completing the square to transform any quadratic equation in x into an equation of the form (x - p)² = q that has the same solutions. Derive the quadratic formula from this form.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: Solve quadratic equations by inspection (e.g., for x² = 49), taking square roots, completing the square, the quadratic formula and factoring, as appropriate to the initial form of the equation. Recognize when the quadratic formula gives complex solutions and write them as a ± bi for real numbers a and b.
skill_short_name: Solve quadratic equations by inspection (e.g., for x² = 49), taking square roots, completing the square, the quadratic formula and factoring, as appropriate to the initial form of the equation. Recognize when the quadratic formula gives complex solutions and write them as a ± bi for real numbers a and b.
name: Solve quadratic equations by inspection (e.g., for x² = 49), taking square roots, completing the square, the quadratic formula and factoring, as appropriate to the initial form of the equation. Recognize when the quadratic formula gives complex solutions and write them as a ± bi for real numbers a and b.

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Recognize and read grade-appropriate irregularly spelled words.
skill_short_name: Recognize and read grade-appropriate irregularly spelled words.
name: Recognize and read grade-appropriate irregularly spelled words.

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Use frequently occurring conjunctions (e.g., and, but, or, so, because).

name: Use frequently occurring conjunctions (e.g., and, but, or, so, because).

description: Use determiners (e.g., articles, demonstratives).

name: Use determiners (e.g., articles, demonstratives).

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Use frequently occurring prepositions (e.g., during, beyond, toward).
skill_short_name: Use frequently occurring prepositions (e.g., during, beyond, toward).
name: Use frequently occurring prepositions (e.g., during, beyond, toward).

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Produce and expand complete simple and compound declarative, interrogative, imperative, and exclamatory sentences in response to prompts.
skill_short_name: Produce and expand complete simple and compound declarative, interrogative, imperative, and exclamatory sentences in response to prompts.
name: Produce and expand complete simple and compound declarative, interrogative, imperative, and exclamatory sentences in response to prompts.

description: Form and use comparative and superlative adjectives and adverbs, and choose between them depending on what is to be modified.

name: Form and use comparative and superlative adjectives and adverbs, and choose between them depending on what is to be modified.

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Use coordinating and subordinating conjunctions.
skill_short_name: Use coordinating and subordinating conjunctions.
name: Use coordinating and subordinating conjunctions.

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Produce simple, compound, and complex sentences.
skill_short_name: Produce simple, compound, and complex sentences.
name: Produce simple, compound, and complex sentences.

subject: ELA - Common Core
description: Correctly use frequently confused words (e.g., to, too, two; there, their).
skill_short_name: Correctly use frequently confused words (e.g., to, too, two; there, their).
name: Correctly use frequently confused words (e.g., to, too, two; there, their).

subject: Math - Common Core
description: A dilation takes a line not passing through the center of the dilation to a parallel line, and leaves a line passing through the center unchanged.
skill_short_name: A dilation takes a line not passing through the center of the dilation to a parallel line, and leaves a line passing through the center unchanged.
name: A dilation takes a line not passing through the center of the dilation to a parallel line, and leaves a line passing through the center unchanged.

subject: Math - Common Core
description: The dilation of a line segment is longer or shorter in the ratio given by the scale factor.
skill_short_name: The dilation of a line segment is longer or shorter in the ratio given by the scale factor.
name: The dilation of a line segment is longer or shorter in the ratio given by the scale factor.
